name: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)

info.description: Provides health insurance coverage of upto Rs. 5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization
info.benefits: Cashless treatment at empaneled hospitals, coverage for pre-existing conditions

info.description: Provides accidental death and disability cover of Rs. 2 lakh for accidental death and Rs. 1 lakh for permanent disability
Provides health insurance coverage to informal sector workers and their families up to Rs. 50,000 per year
Provides cash assistance to pregnant women for institutional delivery
info.eligibility: Pregnant women in rural areas, below poverty line
info.benefits: Cash assistance for antenatal care, delivery, and postnatal care

info.description: Provides cash incentive to pregnant women and lactating mothers for the first living child
info.eligibility: Pregnant women and lactating mothers, first living child
info.benefits: Cash incentive of Rs. 5000 in three installments

info.description: Provides comprehensive healthcare services, including preventive, promotive, curative, and rehabilitative services
info.benefits: Free healthcare services at government health facilities

info.description: Provides free vaccines to children against preventable diseases
info.benefits: Protection against diseases like polio, measles, diphtheria, etc.

info.description: Provides comprehensive cancer care services, including prevention, early detection, treatment, and palliative care
info.benefits: Free or subsidized cancer treatment at designated centers

info.description: Provides mental health services, including prevention, early intervention, treatment, and rehabilitation
